data.name: Schoolgirl Strikers: Final Battle! Fifth Force Forever
data.short_description: Everyone at Fifth Force is fighting to save the real world from the O’bli, while Tsubame takes on Morgana alone. Altair Torte moves to find Tsubame to help her, with assistance from Odile. It’s come down to the wire, but will Fifth Force be able to save everyone?
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

package_groups.name: default
